text:
@MiaFarrow Dear Governors:
We, the U.S. citizens are coming together for
NATIONAL COVID-19 TESTING DAY
Please sign the petition and share. Thank you. 

https://t.co/fVhTfbWGaK

#COVID19 #COVID19Testing #Coronavirus
